Dashboard.liquid-explainer: Liquid Bitcoin (L-BTC) is a wrapped version of Bitcoin (BTC) issued by the Liquid Network, a sidechain-based, Bitcoin layer-2 settlement network. It is a 1:1 pegged asset, meaning that one L-BTC is equivalent to one BTC. L-BTC is designed to improve the functionality of Bitcoin transactions, issuance of digital assets, and exchanges.
Dashboard.tether-explainer: Tether (USDT) is a stablecoin, a type of cryptocurrency designed to maintain a stable value relative to a fiat currency, in this case, the United States dollar (USD). It is issued by Tether Limited, a company founded in 2014, and is pegged to the value of the US dollar.
Dashboard.warning: In order to send USD you need to add Bitcoin to your wallet.

Landing.access: Access global finance in 3 simple steps
Landing.create-account: Create your account with just an email and a password.

Landing.hero-sub-two: Simple, secure and always in your control.

Landing.no-parties: No third parties can access or control your funds without your explicit permission.
Landing.receive-dollars: Receive dollars or bitcoin in seconds. Find safety in stability of the dollar while gaining access to the upside of bitcoin.
Landing.send-messages: Send encrypted messages to your contacts securely through BancoLibre.

Login.2fa: Your account is enabled with two-factor authentication. Use a method below to authenticate your identity.
Login.code: Enter the code from your authenticator app
Login.secure: Your account is secured with an authentication code. Open up the Authenticator app and enter the code here.

Recover.description: If you know your encrypted mnemonic, it can be decrypted in combination with email, password and symmetric key.

Signup.accept-password: I understand that if I forget the password my account cannot be recovered.
